HiearchyComponent
public
Component
struct
HiearchyComponent

Implements IHiearchyComponent. The HiearchyComponent holds data defining the hierarchy of our Entity nodes.

HierarchySystem
public
System
public
IHierarchySystem
HierarchySystem

Implements IHierarchySystem. The HierarchySystem handles parenting entities to other entities via the HierarchyComponent.
